scripts.release: npm version minor && npm run build && git add dist && git commit -m 'Build and dist update' && git push origin main --tags && gh release create v$(node -p -e "require('./package.json').version") dist/* --title 'Release v$(node -p -e "require('./package.json').version")' --notes 'Release notes for v$(node -p -e "require('./package.json').version")'
